mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where your every whim is our command! Join now for exclusive VIP treatment."

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into my local Bank of Entitlement branch, expecting the royal treatment as the CEO, right? But what do I see? A line! Can you believe it? A line at MY bank! Well, let me tell you, I made sure that never happened again. I waltzed up to the front, demanded to speak to the manager, and expressed my utter outrage at having to wait like a commoner. Next thing I know, they've assigned a personal banker just for me, and now I don't even have to step foot inside the bank-everything is taken care of through a special VIP entrance. See, being entitled pays off!
